Recent updates in NYC include Curtis Sliwa hiring armed security due to threats, a high-rise building partially collapsing without injuries, and a Brooklyn woman being attacked during a burglary. Additionally, a man was charged after a lockdown at Hudson Yards, and a triple shooting occurred in the Bronx.

### Risks & Alerts

- Curtis Sliwa hires armed security due to reported serious threats against him. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- No injuries reported after a partial collapse of a New York high-rise building. [Read](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiVEFVX3lxTE9qM2NoWFJpN0ZiZWpKdGJDcEhIT0UwLVllTGhJTnZsc3NMZlowUE5lckZFNGFldVE2WTFmc3BZZ2NLNnY3TEFib0UxZmdUWHdod21zRg?oc=5)
